titleStmt.title: Examinations, or, A discovery of some dangerous positions delivered in A sermon of reformation preached in the church of the Savoy last fast day July 26 by Tho. Fuller, B.D. and since printed / by Iohn Saltmarsh ...
titleStmt.author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.

notesStmt.note: John Saltmarsh wrote this examination of Thomas Fuller' work. cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
With: New quæres of conscience. [Oxford: Printed for William Web, 1643]
